attributes.action: Keep Something for the weekend on BBC
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC are planning to axe the best Sunday morning programme - Something for The Weekend.

We cannot allow them to spoil life for many many true fans of this programme and as such I believe everything should be done to stop this travesiy.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the BBC.

It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters, either on arrangements for scheduling or on content. It is important to maintain the principle of freedom of expression which political interference could undermine.
